attributes.action: Remove John Bercow as speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.additional_details: John Bercow's prejudices are wrecking fair Brexit votes and have cost him MP's trust
attributes.background: I feel that after his over ruling in the house of commons, he over stepped his roll as speaker and moved towards a more bias stance to enable the UK to remain in the EU. It is not his place to over rule the rules of the house, he is not first minister of this country.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP, including the Speaker, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
